content:
Hey y'all! I am definitely not new, neither to Rust nor Zulip. If you've touched topics such as Unsafe Code Guidelines or Rust's use of LLVM or floating point arcana, you've probably seen me around. But this is the closest thing to a proper channel for the following so, um...

Long story short, I'm a trans women. Nothing much gendered about my existence in this community (and I haven't changed my name or nickname) so the main change here is that I use she/her pronouns now. The Rust community is really good about defaulting to they/them pronouns and I don't mind that but she/her would be especially welcome :blue_heart:

I haven't changed my name or nickname

well about that... lol
